about_the_game:
A girl suffering from hallucinations tries her best to live a normal life in the megapolis. She sees an advertisement for a certain doctor presenting a revolutionary technology for diagnosing and treating the psyche, "G.L.A.Z.A".

The heroine hesitates a little and decides to take a chance to dig into her problems and get rid of the need to drink pills. Advertising turns out to be truthful, but first she needs to go through a thorough analysis. And she herself has to dive into the wicked mind and understand the cause of all the problems.

Darkness, monsters, ghosts of the past and a cheerful girl-guide will help the main character along the way, but only to an extent, so that he understands the depth of her own despair.

Features


  • 6 endings
  • 6 dozens of minutes of confusing plot
  • 6 definitions of why you can't talk to the dead

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scenes of violence, murder and blood
The main character suffers from mental disorders
Suicide is mentioned in the game

detailed_description:
A girl suffering from hallucinations tries her best to live a normal life in the megapolis. She sees an advertisement for a certain doctor presenting a revolutionary technology for diagnosing and treating the psyche, "G.L.A.Z.A".

The heroine hesitates a little and decides to take a chance to dig into her problems and get rid of the need to drink pills. Advertising turns out to be truthful, but first she needs to go through a thorough analysis. And she herself has to dive into the wicked mind and understand the cause of all the problems.

Darkness, monsters, ghosts of the past and a cheerful girl-guide will help the main character along the way, but only to an extent, so that he understands the depth of her own despair.

Features


  • 6 endings
  • 6 dozens of minutes of confusing plot
  • 6 definitions of why you can't talk to the dead

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
